Roy T. Fielding wrote:
> ...
> Note: this is an HTTP spec issue, not a REST issue.
> ...

Right.

It would be really if, now that we actually have a new HTTP working 
group, people would go there if they think RFC2616 is incorrect or 
unclear somewhere.

BR, Julian
